item.title: Sensoria
item.description: The tragic side of life is never far away. The least we can do is listen to the pain of others and speak in measured tones of one anotherâ€™s small achievements of wit, grace, and insight. Who are the contemporary equivalents of farmer-kings and slave-holders?
